form.label: Tokens
form.description: A table of all the API/INGEST/RUM token's in your Splunk Observability platform, and their corresponding expiry dates

html.p: Click on a row to expand on token

search.query: `observability_admin_index` `observability_admin_token_sourcetype` |stats latest(expiry) as expiry latest(id) as id latest(authScopes{}) as authScopes by name |eval expiry_seconds = expiry/1000 |eval expiry_formatted = strftime(expiry_seconds,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%6N %Z") |table name id authScopes expiry_formatted |rename expiry_formatted as expiry |sort 0 -expiry

`observability_admin_index` `observability_admin_token_sourcetype` id=$id|s$ |fields - host, index, linecount, punct, source, sourcetype, splunk_server, timestamp |stats latest(*) as * by id |transpose column_name="fields" |rename "row 1" as values |sort +fields
